ygData.subject: Re: Mino horn has gained no additional properties
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is true after you zone. After you zone you will see what is in slot 1, and others will see what is in slot 2. ... if I ... he ... This is true if you
ygData.messageBody:
>> << If you put the bracer in wrist slot #2, others will be able to see it.
>If
>> you put it in wrist slot #1, you'll be able to see it. >>

This is true after you zone. After you zone you will see what is in slot 1,
and others will see what is in slot 2.

>> Not exactly. Sometimes my friend will tell me he cant see my "blue" and
if I
>> re-equip the bracer on my 1st slot (pick it up and put it back) he's says
he
>> can see it.

This is true if you reequip the bracer, you will usually see the last one
that has been worn (though that's kinda changed recently and doesn't 100%
work.

But, once you zone, the above will be true again (slot 1 you see, slot 2
others see).

Daleia d'Allaney
